trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around September 30th 1975
divs: Sighting Detailswe lived in a rural area,out side of springfield.at the time i was 21 years oldand had a baby who was about 18 months old.my husband had been at work inspringfield and the baby and i had stayed at my parents house while my husbandwas at work.he got off work at bullock garages at 900 pm, he picked the baby andi up at my parents house at about 930pm,we hung around talking for awhile, so iam guessing it was more like 945 when we headed for home.i was driveing becausemy husband was exhausted,i stopped and got a couple of dollars of gas.i amdriveing west out the old columbus road,toward home.my husband has fallen asleepon the seat beside me and the baby is asleep in the back seat.I am just driveingalong and i notice this bright white light in the sky ahead of me. At thispoint,i am just curious,because i had driven this road a lot at night and thislight was never there before.actually that was what made me notice it,because itwas out of the norm.i am certain that when i got to the last main road,that ihad to cross over that it was 1015 by my watch.i am certain of that time,idistinctly remember looking at my watch.i continued on straight, headed towardcatawba and south vienna,but out in the country.nothing but fields on eitherside of me.the light is still in the sky only it looks bigger and brighter.myhusband is asleep and so is the baby, i feel curious,anxious,i am comeing to thetee in the road,i will have to turn left and go about a mile and a half down theroad to my house.i have pulled up to the tee,i cant remember if i put the car inpark,i have no memory of doing so,but i do remember that the car was stopped atthe tee and i am looking straight out into the field at this huge boomerrangcraft,its huge i am thi
